00073 
00075 template <class Traits>
00076 struct TriMesh_ArrayKernel_GeneratorT
00077 {
00078   typedef FinalMeshItemsT<Traits, true>               MeshItems;
00079   typedef AttribKernelT<MeshItems, TriConnectivity>   AttribKernel;
00080   typedef TriMeshT<AttribKernel>                      Mesh;
00081 };
00082 
00083 
00084 
00090 template <class Traits = DefaultTraits>
00091 class TriMesh_ArrayKernelT
00092   : public TriMesh_ArrayKernel_GeneratorT<Traits>::Mesh
00093 {};
